entry.title: Unlocking the ‘gut microbiome’ – and its massive significance to our health
entry.content:

Today’s essential reads

Unlocking the ‘gut microbiome’ – and its massive significance to our health

The Guardian · 13 min

Scientists are only just discovering the enormous impact of our gut health – and how it could hold the key to everything from tackling obesity to overcoming anxiety and boosting immunity.

After This Weird NBA Season, We Have A Better Idea Of How Much Fans Matter

FiveThirtyEight · 7 min

How to Store Berries So They Stay Fresher Longer

Bon Appétit · 3 min

Is Extinction a Tragedy, or a Crime?

Popula · 5 min

Zaila Avant-garde won the national spelling bee, but that wasn’t her first real victory

theundefeated.com · 3 min

Fascinating stories

When You Can’t Quit a Crush

The Guardian · 6 min

Falling head over heels in love is one thing, but if it becomes all-consuming you may be in ‘limerence’.

Luxury Surveillance

reallifemag.com · 10 min

People pay a premium for tracking technologies that get imposed unwillingly on others.

‘Unrecognizable.’ Lake Mead, a lifeline for water in Los Angeles and the West, tips toward crisis

Los Angeles Times · 9 min

After years of an unrelenting drought that has quickly accelerated amid record temperatures and lower snowpack melt, the lake is set to mark another, more dire turning point.

Can People Still Play the Same Games as They Get Older?

WIRED · 8 min

Action genre veterans may struggle with the pace and complexity of modern games, but they have no intention of hanging up their controllers.

Where Does Your Go-To Frozen Pizza Rank? We Tried 15, and the Worst One Might Surprise You.

The Washington Post · 7 min

Our honest appraisal of frozen pies, ranked.

What The Rise And Fall Of Lumber Prices Tell Us About The Pandemic Economy

NPR · 4 min

It's been a roller-coaster ride for lumber prices over the last year – and it's drawn outsize attention from the aisles of Home Depot to the Federal Reserve.

Erik Prince's $10 Billion Plan to Make Weapons and Create a Private Army in Ukraine

Time · 17 min

The Best Campground in Every State

Outside Magazine · 25 min

A Decade of Music Is Lost on Your iPod. These Are The Deleted Years. Now Let Us Praise Them.

Esquire · 7 min

Cuba protests: Three key issues that explain the rare unrest

BBC · 4 min

Start your library

My Kids Navigated Our Road Trip—It Was an Adventure

Outside Magazine · 5 min

I gave my 12-year-olds the Rand McNally on our 300-mile drive from Atlanta to the South Carolina coast to impart the joys of reading an old-school physical map.

How to Use a Foam Roller

Apartment Therapy · 4 min

This therapeutic tool will change your life.

Why Are We Obsessed With Weather?

The Atlantic · 4 min

New streaming services from Fox and the Weather Channel are betting big on the idea that an armchair meteorologist lives inside each of us.

The Life and Suspicious Death of Cachou the Bear

Bloomberg · 17 min

Conservationists saw the 6-year-old brown bear as a symbol of hope. Villagers saw him as a menace. Then he turned up dead.

In Praise of the Great Rats in Literature. Literally.

Literary Hub · 16 min

On the most maligned animal in the history of art.
